meta.title: About HNF1B Database
meta.subtitle: A curated resource for HNF1B-related clinical and genetic data

content.intro: Pathogenic variants in **HNF1B** (Hepatocyte Nuclear Factor 1-Beta) are associated with a variety of inherited kidney diseases including:

conditions.name: Congenital Anomalies of Kidney and Urinary Tract
Maturity-Onset Diabetes of the Young, type 5

content.outro: Variable extrarenal manifestations have also been linked to HNF1B defects, including genital tract abnormalities, gout, pancreatic insufficiency, electrolyte abnormalities, liver disease, and neuropsychological disorders.

paragraphs: Although high-throughput sequencing has greatly advanced diagnostic variant detection, there is a lack of specific databases gathering both genotypic and phenotypic information to establish valid genotype-phenotype correlations.

By introducing the **HNF1B Database**, we aim to gather published and unpublished cases for identification of reliable variant-disease associations, ultimately improving clinical management and genetic counseling.

features.title: Systematic Literature Review
features.description: Comprehensive review of all published cases with HNF1B-associated disease from 1997 onwards.

features.title: Unpublished Cohorts
features.description: Integration of locally recruited cohorts with comprehensive clinical and genetic data.

features.title: HPO Ontology
features.description: Phenotypes annotated using Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) terms for standardized clinical characterization.

features.title: Variant Harmonization
features.description: Variants harmonized to HGVS nomenclature (NM_000458.4) with ACMG/AMP classification.

features.title: GA4GH Phenopackets v2
features.description: All clinical data stored using the international standard for phenotypic data exchange.

features.title: VRS 2.0 Compliant
features.description: Variant representations follow the GA4GH Variation Representation Specification.

features.title: Open REST API
features.description: Programmatic access via JSON:API v1.1 compliant endpoints.

features.title: Open Source
features.description: Built with Vue.js 3, FastAPI, and PostgreSQL. Source code available on GitHub.
